Junior Coding Day 2 Requirements

We will be using a custom Fire Tech Camp Swift Playground book - running on an iPad - with screen sharing / broadcasting services.

Hardware

iPads - one per person

  • 8 x iPads with Swift Playgrounds

Software

  • Seesaw: Digital Portfolios

Tutor laptop requires: AirSquirrels Reflector 2 installed to mirror Students iPad screens via AirPlay.

iPads require: Seesaw (for journal keeping), Apps to evaluate, Swift Playgrounds.

Get started
